quote_first: It was the opinion of the forensic pathologist who saw the body at
quote_last: that Mrs. O’Keefe had died very shortly after her return home.
title: A Certain Justice
author: P.D. James

quote_last: ?” exclaimed Helen. “My mother will certainly think we’re lost. But I hate to go. It is magnificent, even if it is terrible.”
title: White Ashes
author: Sidney R. Kennedy
